metadata.synopsis: Voice barks for Jaheira as the player interacts with the screen. 'Normal' lines are lines spoken while walking about in the world, but not in combat or sneaking. 'Sneaking' lines are spoken while in stealth mode - crouched and hiding - and should be read in a hushed voice. 'Combat' lines are spoken while in combat, and should sound stressed/urgent unless otherwise indicated.

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Template SneakingNodeContext: (Relation Positive) Sneaking- About to help another character while Sneaking and they having a positive option about them Usually when the target character is unconscious

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: I may not have claws, but I make do.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Template Combat.NodeContext: (Narrative Arc Start) Combat- Character going to Attack or Cast an offensive Spell while in combat

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: I thought you were tougher than that. Well, no - I didn't.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Template NormalNodeContext: (Relation Negative) Normal - about to help another character while they having a negative option about them Usually when the target character is unconscious

63.speaker: Jaheira
63.text: Please go poke the ranger instead.
63.context:
InternalNodeContext: Template NormalNodeContext: (Narrative Arc Start) Normal -  Character is overwhelmed the player just spammed their portrait like crazy.
Tone varies from warm sarcasm to impatience. 'Omnipresent' line is a reference to one of her most famous barks in the original games: 'Yes, oh omnipresent authority figure?'
